process-feature-table.average: The average value for the respective metrics across all components in the process.
process-feature-table.standard-deviation: The standard deviation for each metric across all components in the process.
process-feature-table.sum: The sum for each respective metric across all components in the process.
process-feature-table.min: The minimum value specifies the smallest value for each respective metric across all components in the process.
process-feature-table.max: The maximum value indicates the largest value for each respective metric across all components of the process.
process-feature-table.target-avg: The average, user-entered, Target-value for each metric across all components in the process.
process-feature-table.target-sum: The target sum for each metric across all components in the process.
